name: The Darkest Plague
description:
When a mysterious plague gas permeates through the City of Metropolis, The Doctor must traverse a surrealistic reformation of their city as they combat mutated soldiers, otherworldly fiends, and their sanity as they try to uncover the plague's origins. Of course, that is if the plague doesn't get to them first.
